casename: Public Prosecutor v Quek Chin Chuan
counsel: Jennifer Marie and Wong Kok Weng (Deputy Public Prosecutors) for the petitioner; Eddie Koh (Yik Koh Teo & Partners) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Courts and Jurisdiction/District court/Powers of district court/Order of district court for police to accompany accused out of jurisdiction to obtain evidence from Defence witness/Whether district court has power to compel police investigations/Whether police under duty to assist accused in defence/Whether evidence admissible/Whether order breaches international law
